member.name: GESTURENOTIFYSTRUCT
member.summary: When transmitted with WM_GESTURENOTIFY messages, passes information about a gesture.

member.name: GESTURENOTIFYSTRUCT.hwndTarget
member.summary: The target window for the gesture notification.

member.name: GESTURENOTIFYSTRUCT.ptsLocation
member.summary: The location of the gesture in physical screen coordinates.

member.name: GESTURENOTIFYSTRUCT.dwInstanceID
member.summary: A specific gesture instance with gesture messages starting with GID_START and ending with GID_END.
